name: FLOW RECORDS
markerNotes: AI record label with multiple sub-labels that post Brazilian/Portuguese Christian music in various genres. Has videos with up to 860k+ views  and 400k+ monthly users on Spotify at time of writing.
comments: AI record label with multiple sub-labels that post Brazilian/Portuguese Christian music in various genres. Has videos with up to 860k+ views  and 400k+ monthly users on Spotify at time of writing.
